quotes.message: We cannot pass our guardian angel's bounds, resigned or sullen, he will hear our sighs.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: One thing you can say for guardian angels: they guard. They give warning when danger approaches.
quotes.name: Emily Hahn

quotes.message: Our private thoughts are known only to God. The secret thoughts of all of us are not known by angels or demons or one another. Every prayer, however, is heard instantly by our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Janice T. Connell

quotes.message: Our guardian angels are closer to us than anything except the love of God.
quotes.name: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.message: Every night and every morning thank your own guardian angel for peace and for the regeneration of all the cells in your body, and for joy.
quotes.name: Dorie D'Angelo

quotes.message: I believe most at-home accidents happen in the bathroom because our guardian angels give us our privacy.
quotes.name: Cathy L. Poulin

quotes.message: I think we all do have a guardian angel. I believe they work through us all the time, when we are thoughtful and good and kind to each other.
quotes.name: Roma Downey

quotes.message: I never wanted a Guardian Angel. I didn't ask for one. One was assigned to me.
quotes.name: Mercedes McCambridge

quotes.message: I think that someone is watching out for me, God, my guardian angel, I'm not sure who that is, but they really work hard.
quotes.name: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.message: The reason angels can fly is because they take themselves lightly.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Angels have no philosophy but love.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: It is not known precisely where angels dwell -- whether in the air, the void, or the planets. It has not been God's pleasure that we should be informed of their abode.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: All God's angels come to us disguised.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Angels are principally the guardians of our spirits. Their function is not to do our work for us, but to help us do it ourselves, by God's grace.
quotes.name: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.message: In Heaven an angel is nobody in particular.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Make yourself familiar with the angels, and behold them frequently in spirit; for, without being seen, they are present with you.
quotes.name: St Francis of Sales

quotes.message: We should pray to the angels, for they are given to us as guardians.
quotes.name: St Ambrose

quotes.message: One function of the angels is illumination, and the other function is that of being a guardian.
quotes.name: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.message: I guess I have never really doubted that we are all born to our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Your two guardian angels are always with you. The other angels come and go as we need them.
quotes.name: Doreen Virtue

quotes.message: Angels are not merely forms of extraterrestrial intelligence. They are forms of extra-cosmic intelligence.
quotes.name: Mortimer J. Adler

quotes.message: When you are lonely or frightened, talk to your guardian angel. You can do it out loud or inside your head, your angel can hear you. Ask your angel to be near you, to put his or her hand on your shoulder, to give you courage and protect you.
quotes.name: Joan Wester Anderson

quotes.message: Remember, Angels are both God's messengers and God's message, witness to eternity in time, to the presence of the divine amidst the ordinary. Every moment of every day is riddled by their traces.
quotes.name: F. Forrester Church

quotes.message: The angels are a strange genus, they are precisely what they are and cannot be anything else. They are themselves soul-less beings who represent nothing but the thoughts and intuitions of their Lord.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Angels assist us in connecting with a powerful yet gentle force, which encourages us to live life to it's fullest.
quotes.name: Denise Linn

quotes.message: Make friends with the angels, who though invisible are always with you. Often invoke them, constantly praise them, and make good use of their help and assistance in all your temporal and spiritual affairs.
quotes.name: Francis de Sales

quotes.message: Where loved ones failed you, guardian angels stand ready to catch your fall.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Everyone was born with a guardian angel. Guardian Angels brighten our journey of life with divine love, protection, peace, healing, grace, strength and, miracles.
quotes.name: Liliah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You should never feel alone there's always someone to turn to, it is the Guardian Angel who is watching over you.
quotes.name: K. Sue

quotes.message: The Holy Guardian Angel is the spiritual Sun of the Soul of the Adept.
quotes.name: Aleister Crowley

quotes.message: Poetry has been the guardian angel of humanity in all ages.
quotes.name: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.message: But if these beings guard you, they do so because they have been summoned by your prayers.
quotes.name: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.message: Some believe strongly that each Christian may have his own guardian angel assigned to watch over him or her.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Angels appear in many different forms to hold your hand through the difficult times.
quotes.name: Doreen Virtue

quotes.message: Be good. This will make your angel happy. When sorrows and misfortunes physical or spiritual afflict you turn to your guardian angel with strong trust and he will help you.
quotes.name: John Bosco

quotes.message: Do not be surprised that you fall every day do not give up, but stand your ground courageously. And assuredly, the angel who guards you will honor your patience.
quotes.name: John Climacus

quotes.message: Our Guardian Angels are our most faithful friends because they are with us day and night, always and everywhere. We ought often to invoke them.
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: The Devil writes down our sins our Guardian Angel all our merits. Labor that the Guardian Angel's book may be full, and the Devil's empty.
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: If only we could see the joy of our guardian angel when he sees us fighting our temptations!
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: If you wish success in life make perseverance your bosom friend.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: When I look back on my life I wonder how I survived my mother said I had a guardian angel.
quotes.name: Micky Dolenz

quotes.message: Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Guardian angels guide the steps of idiots.
quotes.name: Nancy Farmer

quotes.message: Angels are visible to those who accept the light and break the pact made with darkness.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: It comes down to whether you believe in seven miraculous escapes a week or one guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: I guess I have never really doubted that we are all born to our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: Make yourself familiar with the angels and behold them frequently in spirit for without being seen they are present with you.
quotes.name: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.message: A guardian angel o'er his life presiding. Doubling his pleasures and his cares dividing.
quotes.name: Samuel Rogers

quotes.message: Gratitude is our most direct line to God and the angels.
quotes.name: Terry Taylor

quotes.message: A man does not always choose what his guardian angel intends.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: An angel can illumine the thought and mind of man by strengthening the power of vision and by bringing within his reach some truth which the angel himself contemplates.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas
